programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Brownies are too often dull, and blondies (as well as congo bars, their coconut-flavored cousins) can be even worse, since they are even plainer. We decided to keep things simple while focusing on developing superior flavor and texture.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Cakes baked in Bundt and tube pans are popular for a variety of reasons. These pans make cakes that are especially attractive, and the cakes themselves tend to be pretty simple to prepare. In this episode, we make angel food and a chocolate Bundt cake.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We wanted to develop the perfect pumpkin cheesecake recipe, but we never figured it would take 30 cheesecakes to develop a great recipe worthy of the finest holiday dinner.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Watch as we take two modern classic desserts —a chocolate volcano cake and caramelized pears—and make them approachable for the home cook.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Our hearty frittata is just as filling as an omelet, but a whole lot easier to prepare and serve. We also uncover the formula for the ideal quiche filling and deliver a tender, buttery pastry crust filled with moist, smooth custard.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we look at a few of our favorite Tex-Mex dishes: tomato salsa, quesadillas, and beef tacos.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The test kitchen shows you how to make two hearty soups: black bean and tortilla.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: What could be more synonymous with fall than butternut squash? In this episode, we explore two main-course squash recipes: a creamy, comforting soup perfect for serving on a busy weeknight and a rich, hearty risotto suitable for entertaining.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We investigate inexpensive steaks and find out which were worth eating and how best to prepare them. We also take a look at a classic accompaniment to steak: mashed potatoes.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: When most people think of dishes like lasagna and jambalaya, they think of labor-intensive weekend meals. In this episode, however, we develop versions that could be prepared on a busy weeknight.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Two old-fashioned dishes with modern appeal: Boston baked beans and chicken and dumplings. Neither requires fancy ingredients or expensive equipment, just a little time and effort.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: What's for Sunday dinner? Around many American tables, it's meat and potatoes. Beef brisket is a good choice and a nice change from pot roast or beef stew. Although inexpensive and simple to prepare, brisket does pose some challenges to the cook.

programme.title: Inuyasha
programme.desc: In feudal Japan, the half-demon Inuyasha was sealed away by the priestess Kikyo. Many years later he is revived by Kagome.

programme.title: Inuyasha
programme.desc: Kagome finds out that she may be the reincarnation of Kaede's late older sister, the priestess Kikyo, who sealed Inuyasha with her arrow.

programme.title: Inuyasha
programme.desc: Kagome has the ability to see pieces of the Shikon Jewel. Inuyasha has the power to defeat demons. Both of their powers are needed to gather the shards of the jewel.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Anita Manning and Raj Bisram take a 1973 Triumph Spitfire around East Anglia. Anita uncovers the little-known story about anti-slavery campaigner Thomas Clarkson, and Raj hears about an agricultural pioneer at the stunning Holkham Hall.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Behind the wheel of a Triumph Spitfire, Anita Manning and Raj Bisram shop in Norfolk. Anita learns about a forgotten global dancing phenomenon, while Raj heads to Blicking Hall to find out about its controversial former owner.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Anita Manning and Raj Bisram travel through Suffolk, Kent, and Surrey. Anita visits a former silk mill with an incredible royal connection. Raj hears about the birth of interior design and the pioneering artist behind it -- William Morris.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: The gorgeous Kent towns of Deal, Sandwich, and Faversham host Anita Manning and Raj Bisram for some antique shopping. Raj has soared ahead with huge profits, but Anita finds an Eastern deity figure she hopes will attract big bids.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Anita Manning's big win at the last auction is proving a sticky wicket for Raj Bisram, who's keen to avoid the wooden spoon. Raj learns about WWII's Operation Dynamo. Anita uncovers the story behind the bloody murder of Thomas Becket.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Philip Serrell and Catherine Southon set off from the midlands in a 1970 Citroen DS20. Phil spends a lot of cash on a 19th-century butter churn, while Catherine finds two attractive 1940s compacts.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Traveling around in a classic Citroen, Catherine Southon finds a nice croquet set and a rare 1930's novelty biscuit tin, while Phil Serrell learns how flying boats gave us the word 'airport.'

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Catherine Southon decides to change her buying strategy, going for more of Philip Serrell's rust-and-woodworm fare. Phil diverts to the beach and asks a local fisherman if he has some antique chandlery to sell!

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Catherine Southon heads to Porthcurno to see the incredible cables that stretch from this little village to South America, Australia, and India. Phil Serrell goes for a ride on a replica of the Puffing Devil.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Catherine Southon heads to the Royal Mint and finds out how Sir Isaac Newton revolutionized coins to prevent forgers. Phil Serrell gets a lesson in the culture at the Bristol Old Vic and discovers why it's a miracle the building still stands.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Paul Laidlaw and Claire Rawle are in Northumberland. Paul discovers the Morpeth Olympics and Claire learns about the female Indiana Jones, Gertrude Bell. Everything's rosy until Claire mentions she loves militaria -- Paul's specialty!

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Claire Rawle finds out about the Tynemouth Volunteer Life Brigade and Paul Laidlaw visits a military observation post in Blyth. And Paul finds some RAF stereoscopic aerial reconnaissance photographs of German U-boats at a great price.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Claire Rawle discovers the history of big game fishing in the 1930s, while Paul Laidlaw sets off to rendezvous in a secret WWII bunker. Paul buys a pair of Charles Barlow vases, and Claire picks up an early 20th-century spectacle case.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Paul Laidlaw finds a rare 18th-century puzzle jug, and Claire Rawle some Shelley porcelain. Paul discovers how Hull was vital to thousands of Jews fleeing from Tsarist Russia and Claire indulges her passion for all things railway.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team head east to Ipswich, where amongst the treasures they discover a Duke's chamber pot now used to drink champagne, one of the earliest record players and a 50p find on a white elephant stall turns out to be valued at GBP1500.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team enters Border country as the Roadshow visits Manderston. Amongst the items featured are pieces from Queen Victoria's household, a gruesome Man Trap and Lord Palmer's collection of rare biscuit tins now valued in the thousands.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team set up camp in Rochdale's magnificent town hall. Amongst the objects under scrutiny are a gold pencil gifted by King George IV, paintbrushes used by LS Lowry and the diaries of a British hangman.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team visits the Royal Hospital in Chelsea. Amongst the items are a Roulette table built to outwit cheats valued at GBP30,000, a collection of buttons worn by Charles Dickens and a gilded bee from a royal throne thought to have magical powers.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team is at the seaside resort of Ventnor. Under scrutiny is a family portrait showing a Speaker of the House of Commons as a young boy and 75 Austin vehicles. We also hear the story of how a photograph saved a woman's life.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel introduces a selection of unscreened finds from recent Roadshows. Items include an Edward VIII Coronation souvenir that was hastily converted to an abdication mug, early fan mail for Elton John and a collection of art deco treasures.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The Roadshow team head for Lancaster. Amongst the items uncovered in the Town Hall are a valuable pair of clogs, a moving series of letters from Crimea, an anti-slavery ring and a rare and intricately woven tapestry valued at £10,000.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team heads for Coughton Court in Warwickshire. Amongst the items are original designs from one of Britain's leading graphic artists of the 20th Century, a bizarre Japanese depiction of skeletons dancing and a lost masterpiece valued at GBP60,000.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A return visit to Coughton Court in Warwickshire where the experts get excited about an Agatha Christie letter, a medal awarded to those who came to the aid of the Titanic survivors and a rare china figure of the Queen on horseback.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team visits Sydney in Australia. Amongst the items under scrutiny are pieces of furniture made by convicts, a part of the keel of Captain Cook's ship, The Endeavour, and one collector receives one of the biggest valuations in Roadshow history.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team heads to Norwich where, in the Cathedral cloisters, they uncover more treasures. Amongst the items are a letter from Lord Nelson, a series of portraits depicting ancestors of Walt Disney, and correspondence from John Lennon's Aunt Mimi.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: We revisit the cloisters of Norwich Cathedral. The team uncovers original illustrations from Black Beauty, a rare saucer used for many years as an ashtray is valued at £1,000, and some fragments of porcelain remind of the events that destroyed Hiroshima.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team travel to Londonderry. Amongst the items under scrutiny are the most intricately produced hand cut pictures to ever appear on the programme, a cache of silver valued at over GBP100,000 and a cushion woven from human hair.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: Cat and Kristen make Erica's life hell; Lea must choose which man.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: A new Bad Girl finds a mentor in Kristen.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: Lea and Brandi's friendship crumbles; Lea and Kristen join forces; a scandalous night of hookups.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: Kristen and Lea turn against Danielle; unexpected company arrives.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: Christina crosses Lea and Kristen; Erica and Brandi attempt to control the new roommates.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: Christina receives a visit from Natalie Nunn; Brandi tries to repair her relationship with Lea.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: Brandi unleashes a storm of destruction when her wallet goes missing; Kristen grows increasingly resentful of Lea.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: The girls are on the road to Key West where Lea and Kristen's friendship self-destructs.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami
programme.desc: Perez Hilton hosts as the Bad Girls Miami cast reunites to discuss unfinished business, and the sparks continue to fly.

programme.title: Bad Girls Club: Miami

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: To save the Whiskey Girl Saloon in the historic Fort Worth Stockyards, Jon must get an inexperienced co-owner to abandon his hard-partying alter ego, Rick Roundhouse.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Two best friends are acting more like jackasses than owners and find themselves on the verge of losing their dream.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon tries to fix the negligent behavior at Harbor Point Club & Grill in Richardson, Texas, where owners drink the profits away, and the staff struggles to get one order right.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: After a decade of success, a drag racing bar owner is seeing his profits go up in smoke.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jenny McCarthy joins Jon to help the Thunderbolt Bar & Grill, whose owner is an inexperienced man with poor leadership skills, and his only ally is threatening to withdraw her services.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Owners Mark and Ozzie call on Jon for a second time when they need help with their outdated and failing bar, The Edge of Town, in Blue Springs, MO.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon arrives in Littleton, Colorado, to find a mother and son at odds over running the haphazardly decorated G.I. Jodi's, which was originally conceived to honor the military.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: In affluent Aurora, CO, an undisciplined singer turned bar owner has allowed his bloated ego to destroy his business and family, and Jon's team must repair the damage.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: The owner of Utah's The Fifth realized too late that running a successful bar wasn't as easy as his dad made it look, and now he's poised to squander his family's legacy.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: An inexperienced bar owner calls on Jon after hiring a hard-partying manager with no industry knowledge to run Broadway Club in Tooele, Utah.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: In Layton, Utah, Jon confronts Brandon, the emotionally exhausted owner of Linda Lou's Time for Two, who has bled himself and his mother dry trying to keep the bar open.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon is in Midvale, Utah, to meet The Union owner Bill, who is over $500,000 in debt and hasn't picked up any of the bar knowledge required to help his staff.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon is brought in to save The Sandbar in Albuquerque, New Mexico, but before he can save the failing beach-themed bar, he has to figure out who the actual owner is first.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon is in New Mexico to help Mike, the owner of Lucky 66 Bowl, who is over a million dollars in debt and keeps driving customers and employees out the door with his temper.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: After a recent earthquake which almost took his life, Hobie leaves California to live with his mother in Ohio. When they both show up at headquarters a few weeks later Mitch is surprised, especially when he hears the reason they are there.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: John Cort shows up at headquarters and convinces Mitch to compete in the Baja Run dune buggy race with him. What Mitch doesn’t know is Cort is keeping a secret which could land them both in a Mexican prison.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch has to work a 24-hour shift with Stephanie and entrusts Hobie with the responsibility of taking care of himself during that time. But Hobie becomes infatuated with an older girl and is pressured into throwing a party without Mitch’s knowledge.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Carter McKay has recently moved to Southern California to live with his father after his mother's death. When Hobie invites him to the annual father/son lifeguard competition Hobie learns the reason Carter is so embarrassed by his father.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a woman Mitch refers to as “The Mermaid” turns out to be the wife of a crime boss, an FBI agent comes to catch him before he can escape the country. Things become complicated when Mitch and the catty FBI Agent butt heads.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: The beach descends into chaos when DJ Larry "Loomin" Large announces a beach wide treasure hunt for a gold pirate doubloon worth $100,000. The Baywatch team is put on high alert when thousands of reckless treasure hunters storm the beach.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When the hot Santa Ana winds move in from the desert, things start heating up on the Baywatch beach in more ways than one, as it seems like all the “weirdos” in the world have been blown to the beach.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Tracy, a lifeguard-turned-hovercraft expert, arrives at Baywatch to demonstrate the benefits of the new rescue vehicle. Meanwhile, The National Pro Beach Volleyball Tour arrives, reigniting Matt's desire to be a professional beach volleyball star.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Matt and Hobie rescue a young boy who is being harassed by a thug and take care of him until they can get him to his mother, but he seems to be hiding a deep dark secret. Meanwhile, CJ falls for a handsome young man who turns out to be taboo.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Joey joins Mitch and Hobie in decorating for Christmas. CJ has a great time working with Father Ryan but starts to worry that he may misinterpret her warmth as flirting, and that he may be considering quitting the priesthood for her.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Logan's visa is soon to expire, and he will be sent back to Australia unless he gets a green card. He plans on earning the money to purchase one in an upcoming boat race. Meanwhile Mitch’s mother visits.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Stephanie is kidnapped by an eco-terrorist. The Baywatch team must stop the terrorist before she blows up an oil rig with Stephanie constrained inside it!

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch proposes to Tracy, but the happy moment is short-lived as she reveals she has a terminal illness. With the team being short-staffed it is up to Logan and Caroline to deal with reckless wave runners.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch is still mourning Tracy’s death, so Hobie seeks help from a radio show to help Mitch recover. Caroline resuscitates a man with AIDS, which puts a strain on her relationship with Logan. And CJ enters a ballroom dancing competition.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator 298: Storley vs. Ward was a mixed martial arts event produced by Bellator MMA that took place on August 11, 2023, at the Sanford Pentagon in Sioux Falls, South Dakota, United States.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator 299: Eblen vs. Edwards was a mixed martial arts event produced by Bellator MMA, that took place on September 23, 2023, at the 3Arena in Dublin, Ireland.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Watch historic Bellator 300, headlined by a semifinal matchup in the LWGP between current champion Usman Nurmagomedov vs. former champion Brent Primus

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Undefeated Welterweight Ukrainian champ Yaroslav Amosov puts his belt on the line against Jamaican Jason Jackson.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA returns to Hollywood, Florida with an explosive night of fights. Champion Eddie Alvarez defends his belt against Lightweight Tournament Winner Michael Chandler in one of Bellator MMA's most epic fights.

programme.title: Bellator MMA Full Fight Cards
programme.desc: Bellator MMA comes to Irvine with two belts on the line! First Pat Curren defends his Featherweight belt against Patricio 'Pitbull' Freire. Then in the main event, Michael Chandler takes on Rick Hawn for the Lightweight World Championship.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: One day off heroin Sarah begins painful withdrawals. Tecoa struggles with drug cravings while two weeks clean and six months pregnant. Are Dr. Phil's efforts sabotaged between the twins? Dr. Phil shows the girls a terrifying look into their future. Part 2

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues with Sandi, 60, discussing her online relationship with Peter, 22. Dr. Phil speaks to Peter in Nigeria via satellite & he insists he loves Sandi. Will Sandi listen to her daughters' concerns, or will she fly to Nigeria to marry Peter?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Kala Brown made national headlines when she was discovered alive 2 months after disappearng in South Carolina. She was kidnapped, locked in a metal storage container & chained on the neck by a serial killer. Kala speaks about her life in captivity.Pt. 1

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues an incredible story of a woman brutally raped at age 15. Loretta identified the alleged rapist and helped police put him behind bars. But her world was rocked 14 years later when the man, Dean, was exonerated due to DNA evidence. Pt. 2

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: From marital spats to disagreements on discipline, learn the biggest mistakes you may be making. Plus, a money expert reveals financial faux pas.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: From curing rare forms of cancer to foreseeing mass destruction, to freeing others from sickness and sin, Julia believes she is "God's chosen prophet". Parents, Mark and Cheryll, worry their daughter is mentally ill with deep concern for the grandkids.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Megan's ex-boyfriend Andy is trying to replace her as their 5-year-old son's mother with his new fiancée, Caitlin. Megan says Andy lied to the judge, falsely painting her as unfit, unstable & a drug addict. Andy says Megan's tale of woe is a sob story.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Kristle, Kayla & Patrick say mom Sherry has blown a $250,000 inheritance in 11 months, with $500 bar tabs & new motorcycles. But that's not it. They say mom takes non-prescribed pills, washes them down with rum & has pulled out a loaded gun while arguing.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil sits down with mom Cindy with footage of her daughter Sarah's street life: prostitution, smoking crack cocaine and shooting heroin. Twin Tecoa tells how it began. Off the streets and into The Dr. Phil House, will the girls commit to rehab? Part 1

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil exposes an online dating fraud -- a catfish -- accused of duping as many as 26 women into relationships. What were the red flags the women missed? Plus, a Dr. Phil producer tracks the catfish down -- and you won’t believe who they find!

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues his mission to end the silence on domestic violence. More than 25 percent of battered women remain in a relationship with their abuser. Sonya fears that she is one of those women who stay. Hear her story.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: If you're in difficult economic times & looking for ways to save money, start taking notes! Dr. Phil's guests offer tips to help save on clothes, utilities & vacations. Learn how to cut your grocery bill in half & how to entertain family inexpensively.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Angie says stepfather Ralph routinely sexually abused her as a teen. Angie says that her stepfather didn't stop with her, he turned his attention, affection & sexual abuse toward her daughter Hannah. They say grandma Leta knew, yet looked the other way.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Do you have a relative scheming to get money from a rich aunt, uncle or even parents when they pass away?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Melissa says Destoni, 14, is an aggressive, violent bully. She's chased her sister with a butcher knife, yells at teachers in the hallways but Destoni crossed a line when she threatened to shoot her teacher and other students, causing suspension. Part 1

channel.display-name: Best of The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Fat Joe talks about his memoir, "The Book of Jose," with Drew. Natasha Leggero covers news with Drew and Ross, discussing memory after childbirth and "sitter-vising." Fat Joe and Leo Kelly make caterpillars from old socks.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Renowned OBGYN Dr. Suzanne Gilberg-Lenz is answering burning questions about sexual health including activities that could affect male fertility.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Talk" co-host Sheryl Underwood is joining Drew and talking all about dating! Drew and Ross Mathews are covering the latest headlines in an all-new Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Carla Hall joins Drew and Ross Mathews for food news, covering an avocado ripeness detector and TikTok restaurant reviews. Carla makes frittata with Drew, while Lindsay Peers and Tariq join for a Thanksgiving craft at "The Craft Studio.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew sits down with tennis superstar Serena Williams to chat about her final match, her family life and her new children's book, 'The Adventures of Qai Qai.' Plus, Serena plays a rapid fire round of all of her favorites in GOATS To Go.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Costume designer Patricia Field is telling Drew all about some of the famous looks she's created for "Sex and the City," "The Devil Wears Prada" and more.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross are joined by beauty guru Zanna Roberts Rassi at the news desk to break down the latest beauty headlines. Then, in an all-new Drew-Gooder, Zanna transforms a busy mom of two and special needs teacher.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Icon Martha Stewart and Drew tackle relationship red flags at the news desk and Martha reveals which young star she simply adores.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: In an all-new Drew Gooder Drew has a big surprise in store for Deloris "NuNu" and Patrick "PopPop" Hogan who run a safe and reliable 24-hour daycare to help the parents in their community.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny side up in an all-new Drew's News. Plus, "Bros" stars Ts Madison, Jim Rash and Miss Lawrence.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Actress and author of the new audiobook, "Inside Voice" Lake Bell stops by to chat.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross cover news about a senior dance troupe and a Jet-Puffed marshmallow pillow. Mark Anderson and Ryan Fey make skirt steak tacos. Damona Hoffman and Drew answer red flag questions.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: RuPaul's Drag Race" host RuPaul is talking about the show and helping Drew come up with her drag name!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew is joined by "Shotgun Wedding" star Josh Duhamel to chat about his new film. Inside Edition correspondent Lisa Guerrero is joining Drew and Ross Mathews to cover the headlines in a new Drew's News and dishes on her new memoir.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross are joined by "She-Hulk" star Jameela Jamil at the news desk. Then, it's an all-new Mom's Time Out: Vegas Edition, where Drew surprises deserving moms with a night out at the Magic Mike Live show.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Gossip Girl" star Thomas Doherty is dishing on season two of the show! Dating expert Damona Hoffman is back and talking to Drew about "Drew love.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Weird: The Al Yankovic Story" star Daniel Radcliffe stops by to chat.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Chef Remi Cruz is joining Drew in the kitchen to whip up some delicious fried mac n' cheese bites. The world's oldest female comedian Dionne Forest is doing a hilarious stand-up set.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Comedian Celeste Barber, known for her hilarious celebrity parodies, joins Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk to cover the latest headlines including the one perk employees most wish their employer would offer and share Rihanna's latest collab.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up and covering topics like the solutions you can try if you're a chronic late texter and the reason many people are opting for environmentally friendly burials.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Entertainment Tonight's Kevin Frazier and Nischelle Turner are joining Drew and Ross Mathews at the Drew's News desk for a special Oscars themed Drew's News, sharing their predictions for the awards show.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Last Thing He Told Me" star Jennifer Garner is getting a big birthday surprise from Drew.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: A League of Their Own" star Abbi Jacobson opens up about her recent engagement, her bestie Ilana Glazer, what it was like co-creating, writing, producing and starring in "A League of Their Own" and more!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Bill Nye The Science Guy are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News. Then, Chef Pilar Valdes reveals five essential pantry items and turns them into a delicious dish.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News. Then, it's an all-new Cookbook Club with "Half Baked Harvest" author Tieghan Gerard who is whipping up Finish Spicy Shrimp Tacos.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Lena Dunham on her new medieval comedy film "Catherine Called Birdy." Plus, Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Former first lady Michelle Obama is telling Drew about how she remains grounded, raising kids with social media and the inspiration for her new book, "The Light We Carry.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro, worried that his diner the Hungry Gizzard has no customers, has a wonderful idea. He busts in on Mr. Drysdale trying to impress the wealthy Vanderpools, announcing the restaurant is going topless. Confusion ensues.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny wants to leave sunny California because she misses winter, sending Mr. Drysdale into a panic. The banker enlists Miss Jane in an elaborate scheme to convince the Clampetts that a blizzard has occurred.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The last televised wrestling match was such a success that the promoter wants a rematch. Granny isn't interested until Rebecca's parents visit.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny is worried about Miss Jane's spinsterhood and convinces Jethro to ask her to marry him. Granny assures him that she will decline the proposal, but Hathaway accepts, leading to panic in the Clampett household.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny is on the warpath concerning the chaos caused by Ellie's critters and declares either they go or she does. Mr. Drysdale is equally irritated by the expense of his wife's poodle. Jed tries to find a solution.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny and Jethro believe they have psychic abilities, but Granny's predictions stop coming true. With her reputation on the line, she picks a stock for Mr. Drysdale that could cost him a small fortune.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Heading to England, Jethro smuggles Ellie's turkey buzzard on the plane upsetting Mr. Drysdale and a fellow passenger. After landing, they try to meet with the Queen to give her their 80 million dollars. Their butler Faversham tries to clear things up.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: After the Clampetts return from London, Granny gets a letter from Hooterville asking her to help with Betty Jo Elliot's baby.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: While Granny is away in Hooterville, Mr. Drysdale hires a gorgeous Italian cook who speaks no English.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny and the Italian chef compete to see who will cook for the family.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts spend Thanksgiving in Hooterville.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale casts Dash Riprock as Homer Noodleman, a potential new lover for Elly May.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro wants a new identity with the replacement of their old truck with a modern hot rod. Granny wants to stay with the old truck. To prove how good the old truck is, Granny races Jethro in his hot rod.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts prepare to go to Hooterville for Christmas.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale follows the Clampetts and Miss Jane to Hooterville where they are spending Christmas. He takes Ellie's bear Fairchild with him and gets himself thrown in jail in a little town. Sam Drucker shows up to help.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Drysdale is sick, and Dr. Granny springs into action with a chimp as a nurse. But Ellie's bear Fairchild has taken a liking to granny's flu remedy. During this, Mrs. Drysdale tries to impress society Mrs. Van Ransonhoff.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro is evicted because his 50 cent allowance won't cover the rent. The other Clampetts take over the space with Granny will cut hair or pull teeth. Jed will sharpen tools and whittle something. Ellie is the pretty receptionist.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: With the Clampetts established in business in Jethro's vacated office space, a building inspector visits to find out about their business operations on the 5th floor.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Sam Drucker comes to Beverly Hills to visit, and Granny assumes he's interested in courting her.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Drysdales now jog so the banker can get the account of Jason Detweiler, head of a running club. The Clampetts don't understand the concept, leading to misunderstandings, then Ellie and Jethro become enthusiastic.

programme.desc: Mona discovers everyone is hanging out with Chase behind her back. Gus leaves town, leaving Brett in charge of the office. But when Dee Dee's colleagues tell her he is envious of her new responsibilities she tries to keep the peace in the office.

programme.desc: Mark and Vanessa think that they won the lottery but can't find their winning ticket.

programme.title: Monty Python's Flying Circus
programme.desc: A spoof of British political-party broadcasts includes the finals of "the worst family in Britain" contest, a violent cricket match and a housewife who revolutionized beekeeping.

programme.title: Drop The Dead Donkey: Sally in TV Times

programme.title: Drop The Dead Donkey: Crime Time

programme.title: Drop The Dead Donkey: No More Mr. Nice Guy

programme.title: Drop The Dead Donkey: Henry's Autobiography
programme.desc: Henry writes his life story; George is in a panic over an interview; Sally shoots a fitness video.

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: To get some time away from his future bride Sophie, Mark joins a gym.

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: Jeremy is thrilled when one of his musical heroes, The Orgazoid, employs him as a general handyman.

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: Jeremy arranges Mark a canal boat stag weekend but soon finds himself distracted by the beautiful Aurora.

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: It's the day of the big wedding and Mark is desperately looking for a way out of going through with it.

programme.title: Black Books
programme.desc: Bernard and Manny accept a house-sitting job to get away from their new cleaner. They also drink some wine. Meanwhile, Fran goes on an ill-fated date.

programme.title: Black Books
programme.desc: A caffeine-fueled Manny is mistaken for a policeman. Bernard recalls a disastrous dinner party with old friends and Fran tells him about blanking her boyfriend after catching him with another woman.

programme.title: Plebs: The New Master
programme.desc: Grumio is sent to work for another master after injuring his slave, later prompting a rebellion.

programme.title: Plebs: The Weatherist
programme.desc: When weatherist Strabo moves in next door and predicts an earthquake, Marcus and Stylax use the opportunity to improve their love lives.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: Merry Christmas Mr. Bean

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: Dr. Jack Kerruish leaves Africa hoping to become a country G.P. Meanwhile, Beth Glover and Will Preston are looking for a partner to join their Derbyshire practice, The Beeches.

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: Jack's arrival affects all of the staff at The Beeches. Kim gets a promotion as Will feels on the outside and Beth is in danger of mixing her personal and professional lives.

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: Whilst Beth takes a break, Jack's relationship with a female patient puts the future of the practice in jeopardy. Meanwhile, Will learns a terrible secret about Sarah.

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: New trainee Rhianne Lewis arrives, increasing the tension between Jack and Beth. Whilst Isabel embarks on a new relationship, Jack and Will's is falling apart.

programme.title: The Brief
programme.desc: Henry Farmer takes on an unwinnable murder case as his life falls apart around him.

programme.title: Doc Martin
programme.desc: Al discovers that Bert is not his natural father; Martin diagnoses food poisoning for a rural family with a mysterious unseen mother.

programme.title: Doc Martin

programme.title: The Royal

programme.title: The Royal

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): El camino al infierno
programme.desc: Danny debe determinar quién asesinó a un hombre cuando varias mujeres que trabajaron para él se atribuyen el mérito.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Un nuevo comienzo
programme.desc: Erin se siente abrumada por la culpa después de que un hombre al que liberó es acusado de matar a un policía.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Ayúdame a ayudarte
programme.desc: Linda pide a Danny y Báez que ayuden a su compañera de trabajo, quien está teniendo problemas con su exmarido enfurecido.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: UAC está buscando a un sospechoso que tal vez esté fascinado por inquietantes experimentos médicos.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC implementa una estrategia elaborada para tratar de acabar con el anillo de sicarios “Los doce sucios”, con Reid jugando un papel central.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando se encuentran cuerpos en lugares públicos alrededor de Boston, el UAC investiga si un taxi o servicio de transporte que las víctimas utilizaron antes de su muerte podría guiar hasta el sospechoso.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC busca un móvil y un sospechoso cuando las víctimas se encuentran en los inodoros de las paradas de camiones a lo largo de las carreteras en todo el sur.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El Director Vance, aún de luto por la pérdida de su mujer y la madre de sus hijos, descubre inesperada información personal que le generará dudas sobre absolutamente todo.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: NCIS rastrea intensamente a Ducky y Jimmy luego de haber desaparecido mientras transportaban el cuerpo de una escena del crimen.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Un frenesí mediático en torno a un criminal no identificado lleva al barbero de Gibbs a cuestionar la participación de su hijo y pedirle ayuda para descartarlo como el principal sospechoso.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: La esposa de un Marine especializado en la detección de bombas K-9 urge al equipo de NCIS para que investigue la reciente muerte de su marido en Afghanistan.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Ayúdame a ayudarte
programme.desc: Linda pide a Danny y Báez que ayuden a su compañera de trabajo, quien está teniendo problemas con su exmarido enfurecido.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Amigos en necesidad
programme.desc: Jamie y Danny difieren en cómo manejar a un novato imprudente del NYPD, Marcus, hijo de un amigo de Danny. Mientras tanto, Erin investiga una mala inversión en la que se vio envuelto su investigador, Anthony, por culpa de su primo.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Ciudad despiadada
programme.desc: Frank y Danny colaboran para ayudar a Nick Constantine, un exconvicto rehabilitado que Frank había encarcelado años atrás, cuando Constantine se ve implicado en el asesinato de un viejo enemigo.

programme.title: Bachelorette Weekend

programme.title: Bachelorette Weekend

programme.title: The History of Comedy

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man receives an enormous break due to public health concerns. Officers are doubtful when two friends claim they were unaware of each other’s actions. Police pull over a car full of people who know very little about themselves.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police investigate suspicious activity in a known drug area, officers encounter a jaywalker with the munchies, and a woman caught with meth wants points for honesty.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police question the legitimacy of the name a driver gives them. Both husband and wife protect each other in a case of domestic violence. A 12-year friendship is jeopardized when a woman suspects her roommate of stealing.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A bloodied man prowls around an apartment complex. Officers pull over a suspicious vehicle and seize drugs belonging to a passenger who is arrested. Police seize drugs and a large knife from a bicyclist.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer pursues an unruly bicyclist, a man ducks into a drive-through in an attempt to elude police, and a deputy pulls over a stolen vehicle driven by a repeat offender.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer tackles a masked man with an outstanding warrant, an erratic driver is stopped driving to a nail salon, and police respond to a domestic assault involving hot wax.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police track a possible stolen vehicle, a man upset with his neighbors takes matters into his own hands, and officers try to placate a man holding a knife to his own throat.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police catch up to a man with warrants and a history of resisting arrest, a fidgety driver arouses suspicion, and a minor with beers in his pants has to answer to his mom.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man in hiding is sniffed out quickly by the K-9 unit, a couple gets caught lying when an officer recognizes them, and a woman's dogs save her a trip to jail.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies respond to an armed carjacking, an altercation leads to a woman's arrest, and officers face a combative man.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A neighborhood search ends with the suspect in a stranger's home, a pastor calls about a suspicious car parked behind his church, and a deputy gives advice to a young mother.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A wanted man attempts to hide at his grandmother's house, police arrest a suspect driving a stolen vehicle, and officers call animal control for an injured dog.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers tackle a man carrying other people's credit cards, two women deny ownership of drug paraphernalia found in their bags, and police mediate a father-son dispute.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A seatbelt violation ends in a chase to the confusion of all involved. A suspect with a history of grand theft auto is found in another stolen car. Officers find drugs in a tough part of town.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man is captured after appearing on an episode of "America's Most Wanted". An Officer detains a man for drug possession. Officers serve a search warrant and find four suspects with narcotics in their home.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies search a suspicious vehicle behind a strip club. A man threatens to shoot employees at a car rental company. A man tosses lip balm filled with narcotics out the window during a traffic stop.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: While attempting to break up a fight between two women an officer is attacked by one of the brawler’s boyfriends. Officers confiscate a negligible amount of marijuana from a man during a routine traffic stop. A man is arrested for domestic abuse.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A dangerous pursuit between Officers and a known meth dealer ends in an arrest. A suspect with several felony warrants is apprehended without incident. A pursuit involving a stolen motorcycle exceeds speeds of 100mph.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A driver pursued by police bails from her moving vehicle, a jaywalker decides to run from officers, and a patrol encounters a little boy who decided to run away from home.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A DUI suspect with a suspended license claims he’s not drunk. Officers track an armed robber. An armed and dangerous suspect hides from officers in an apartment complex.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police investigate a possible abduction at a trailer park. A man in a stolen truck is pulled over and Officers discover washed checks and drug paraphernalia. A suspect is arrested after abandoning a stolen vehicle behind a fast food restaurant.

programme.desc: When officers approach, a suspect flees into a fast-food restaurant. A driver takes his granny's wheels for a dangerous spin with cops in pursuit. Sheriffs catch up to a man who fled the scene of a possible domestic battery.

programme.title: Corona de Lagrimas
programme.desc: Refugio trabaja como contadora para poder mantener a sus tres hijos. Sin embargo, la vida de todos da un giro cuando uno de ellos es llevado a la cárcel y tienen que resolver sus propios problemas.

programme.title: The Lookout

programme.title: Fuimos héroes

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: “Amistad” es la historia de un motín en 1839 a bordo de un barco de esclavos que viaja a la costa noroeste de Estados Unidos. Gran parte de la historia tiene que ver con un drama judicial sobre el esclavo que lideró la rebelión.

programme.title: Showgirls: lo prohibido

programme.title: A Month By The Lake

programme.title: Mi difunto novio
programme.desc: Una mujer descubre la verdad sobre su novio después de que lo encuentra muerto en su casa.

programme.title: La Mexicana

programme.title: Soltera a los 30
programme.desc: Cuando Kate cumple 30 años, sus amigas Evie y Charlie se ofrecen a hacer una fiesta, pero la fiesta se sale de control.

programme.title: Treintona, soltera y fantástica
programme.desc: Una mujer en sus treinta y tantos años se descubre a sí misma a través de la vida, el amor y el corazón roto.

programme.title: La suburban dorada
programme.desc: Un policía judicial es acusado de estar relacionado con el narcotráfico solo por ayudar a su primo. Las circunstancias lo convierten en un fugitivo de la ley y por recuperar a su hijo tiene que involucrase con el narcotráfico.

programme.title: Respeto (2012)
programme.desc: Lucas comienza un romance con Jasmine sin saber que antes anduvo con Jacob, uno de sus amigos. Tras sentirse traicionado, Jacob delata a Lucas con el hermanastro de Jasmine y solo provoca la ira entre pandillas.

programme.title: Terminator: El exterminador

programme.title: Ejecutor

programme.title: Regreso al infierno
programme.desc: Cuando período de servicio en Irak llega a su fin, cuatro soldados estadounidenses se enteran de que están programados pare emprender una misión final. Una misión profética que cambiará eternamente el concepto que tenían hasta ahora de guerra.

programme.title: Enemigo al acecho
programme.desc: Dos francotiradores, uno ruso y uno alemán, juegan al gato y el ratón durante la Batalla de Stalingrado.

programme.title: Rescate al amanecer

programme.title: El infierno
programme.desc: Benny ha sido deportado de los Estados Unidos a México, que está siendo destrozado por las guerras de los carteles de droga. Luego se involucra en el negocio del narcotráfico y comienza a subir de rango.

programme.title: No eres tú, soy yo
programme.desc: Después de la ruptura de su reciente matrimonio, Javier se encuentra en una depresión de la que ni siquiera un psiquiatra puede ayudarlo a salir. Sin embargo, la esperanza está en camino en la forma improbable de sus exnovias.

programme.title: La habitación
programme.desc: Ocho historias que ocurren en la misma habitación en diferentes períodos de la historia mexicana.

programme.title: Perfectos desconocidos
programme.desc: Cuando un grupo de mejores amigos se reúne durante un eclipse lunar para compartir una cena íntima en la elegante casa de Eva y Antonio, sospechan que se trata de otra noche cualquiera hasta que la anfitriona les propone un juego.

programme.title: Ilusiones S.A.
programme.desc: Para hacer feliz a su mujer, un hombre contrata a una empresa que crea fantasías para fingir que su nieto, quien los dejó hace años, es un hombre de bien. Pero el verdadero nieto, quien es en realidad un delincuente, se aparece exigiendo dinero.

programme.title: Una última y nos vamos
programme.desc: Un grupo de mariachis salen de casa por primera vez para competir en un certamen nacional en la ciudad de México. Los 8 hombres tienen que soportar muchos desafíos, lo que parece ser una oportunidad de su vida, pronto podría conducir al final del grupo.

programme.title: Me late chocolate
programme.desc: Después de que su prometido muere inesperadamente, una mujer decide aceptar la vida y seguir su sueño de trabajar con chocolate.

programme.title: Portadores

programme.title: Mimic 2
programme.desc: Una mutación de cucarachas asesinas sorprende a la ciudad de Nueva York. Se crean imitaciones para infiltrar su grupo y acabar con ellas, pero estas evolucionan y se transforman en seres humanos para seguir acabando con la humanidad.

programme.title: Mimic 3: sentinel

programme.title: Estación zombi

programme.title: Pandemia lupina

programme.title: Drácula 2000
programme.desc: El maestro del terror Wes Craven presenta una adaptación moderna y sexy del clásico thriller gótico. Luego de que Drácula despierta de su sueño de 100 años, su primer destino es Estados Unidos y la exótica ciudad de Nueva Orleans.

programme.title: Sabor a sangre y chocolate
programme.desc: Adaptación del relato de la autora Annette Curtis Klause acerca de una joven loba adolescente, que debe elegir entre su amor por un joven humano muy lindo y honrar la lealtad de la manada.

programme.title: De fiesta en las alturas

programme.title: La chica de rojo

programme.title: Último viaje a Las Vegas

programme.title: Duel at Diablo

programme.desc: In a crooked attempt to buy the building next to his cleaning store, George Jefferson has decided to run for a position on the Republican county commission and needs Archie to sign a petition.

programme.desc: Walter's worries over a business loan ruin his vacation, and then he receives word that may ruin his life.

programme.desc: Rob resorts to psychological warfare to get even with a practical joker.

programme.desc: An art collector sees a woman modelling for a sculptor who looks exactly like the subject of his Renoir painting but she flees so he hires Intertect and Mannix to find her.

programme.desc: A deaf woman "overhears" a portion of a kidnapping/murder plot. Mannix tries to determine the victim's identity and whereabouts before the time limit to pay the ransom.

programme.desc: Se detalla el asesinato en Seattle de 1996 de la pareja suburbana Raquel Rivera y Jay Johnson. La evidencia del perro, Chief, de la pareja finalmente vincula a uno de los asesinos a la escena.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 2006, Kathy Augustine, una política de Nevada, murió misteriosamente durante una campaña de reelección. El médico forense no pudo aislar la causa de la muerte ni explicar las pequeñas heridas punzantes descubiertas durante la autopsia.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1993, la joven madre, Tammy Tatum, fue encontrada agredida sexualmente y asesinada en su departamento de Longmont, Colorado.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La mujer había sido agredida sexualmente, apuñalada repetidamente y dada por muerta.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un violador en serie anda suelto en una ciudad de Texas. Nadie sabía dónde atacaría a continuación, pero la audacia de sus ataques y la escalada de violencia contra sus víctimas hicieron que encontrarlo fuera imperativo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Después de que aparecen 10 cuerpos en Florida, una víctima – Lisa McVey de 17 años de edad – es secuestrada pero liberada. Ella lleva a la policía al autor del crimen, Bobbie Joe Long.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Una Bolsa de Evidencia
programme.desc: Se investiga el asesinato de Jessica Knott, de 9 años. Los investigadores usan una bolsa de basura para conectar al sospechoso James Edward Crow, Jr. con el crimen.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1996, más de una docena de niños en Seattle, Washington, luchaban por sus vidas. Cada uno de ellos había contraído una enfermedad grave desconocida. Después de que uno murió, los investigadores sabían que el reloj estaba corriendo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Mark Fair se fue a trabajar y su prometida, Karla Brown, se quedó en casa. Más tarde, la encontró muerta. Durante la autopsia, se volvieron a examinar las marcas de mordeduras en su cuerpo y la odontología forense identificó al asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Pista elemental
programme.desc: Cuando dos mujeres del mismo pueblo fueron asesinadas de la misma manera, la policía temió que un asesino en serie estuviera suelto.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Dentro de un cabello
programme.desc: Una mirada retrospectiva al caso del violador de River Park, que asaltó a cuatro mujeres en South Bend, Indiana, durante 1996. Los agentes del orden arrestaron a Richard Alexander, quien fue declarado culpable en 1998 y sentenciado a 70 años de prisión.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Programado para el desastre
programme.desc: Una mujer de 29 años murió instantáneamente cuando una bomba explotó en su casa. El dispositivo era tan poderoso que la metralla estaba incrustada en las casas al otro lado de la calle.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Timothy Wilson Spencer fue identificado como el hombre que violó y estranguló a cinco jóvenes mujeres en Virginia. Con el uso de perfiles de ADN, se libera a un hombre inocente y se condena al verdadero asesino.

programme.title: Primeval
programme.desc: A teenage boy is dragged into a drain when an anomaly opens underwater. In their attempts to rescue the boy, the team come across sinister creatures from the future.

programme.title: Primeval

programme.title: Primeval

programme.title: Primeval

programme.title: Attenborough and the Giant Dinosaur

programme.title: Alarma TV
programme.desc: Un show de revista de media hora que se transmite de lunes a sábado donde se presentan noticias únicas de lo que acontece alrededor del mundo.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Una típica familia mexicana disfuncional conformada por Gaspar, el padre de la familia, su hijo Jonathan, el abuelo, y un amigo cercano a la familia al que apodan "El Noruego", harán de las suyas en esta comedia animada.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Una típica familia mexicana disfuncional conformada por Gaspar, el padre de la familia, su hijo Jonathan, el abuelo, y un amigo cercano a la familia al que apodan "El Noruego", harán de las suyas en esta comedia animada.

programme.title: Norteados con Don Cheto
programme.desc: EstrellaTV es el canal líder en español de noticias y entretenimiento con una gran variedad de programación que abarca noticias y juegos, realities, competencias de talento y “talk shows”. ¡Una experiencia que no se pueden perder!

programme.title: 100 latinos dijeron
programme.desc: Dos familias competirán respondiendo a distintas preguntas por la oportunidad de ganar dinero basados en las respuestas más populares, de acuerdo a las previamente respondidas por 100 latinos alrededor de Estados Unidos.

programme.title: Retofamosos
programme.desc: Seis famosos son reunidos en una azotea para enfrentar los retos más atrevidos, graciosos, chuscos y hasta arriesgados en donde el glamour y la fama se quedan atrás para dar paso a la diversión y el buen humor.

programme.title: A que no puedes
programme.desc: Emocionante juego que enfrenta a dos equipos de celebridades en su intento por realizar pruebas y retos únicos. El equipo que complete con éxito la tarea, ganará dinero para una obra de ayuda social.

programme.title: 100 latinos dijeron
programme.desc: Dos familias competirán respondiendo a distintas preguntas por la oportunidad de ganar dinero basados en las respuestas más populares, de acuerdo a las previamente respondidas por 100 latinos alrededor de Estados Unidos.

programme.title: Mi sueño es bailar
programme.desc: Celebridades ayudan a los participantes a hacer sus sueños realidad. Durante cada episodio la pareja con más puntos obtiene la oportunidad de escoger cual sueño se hará realidad.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the early hours of a morning just before Christmas, a college student was abducted from the parking lot of her apartment. Her body was found later that day; she had been sexually assaulted and shot at point-blank range.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a woman disappeared without a trace, there were two possible explanations: kidnapping or murder. Careful investigation, a forensic artist and DNA profiling enabled police to find a single suspect, who was known to prey upon vulnerable women.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984, a passerby finds the torso of a woman in a cardboard box. A forensic entomologist analyzes nearby insect activity to determine when the victim was killed.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The only clue recovered from a shooting is a twelve-guage shotgun. Scientists use unique methods to lift the serial number from the weapon to trace it to its owner

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl went missing from her Colorado home. The only evidence the kidnapper left behind was three fingerprints on a window screen.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When heart surgeon Darryl Sutorius is found dead in the basement of his upscale Cincinnati home, police assume he committed suicide. Further investigation reveals that his new wife Della has a history of violence and an insatiable desire for money.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2002, a small community in upstate New York was devastated when Patty Wlasiuk died in a truck accident. But burdock seed pods found in her hair and on her clothes indicated that this was no accident — it was cold-blooded murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a 9-year-old girl goes missing, police and volunteers spend weeks searching for her. A psychic's vision leads to a field where her body is discovered, along with what investigators hope is enough evidence to find her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2005, the body of young mother Summer Baldwin was found in a suitcase in a Texas landfill.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Tracey Frame, 35, was convicted of killing David Nixon in April 2002 after he planned to end their relationship.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: While vacationing in California, Earl Morris learns that his wife has gone missing from their Arizona home. The search for Ruby Morris involves dozens of investigators and scientists — and even the Coast Guard.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is shot to death in her store just one day before she is to testify against the man accused of robbing her. The robber becomes the prime suspect, but he has a solid alibi: a timestamped videotape of his activities on the day of the murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a young girl was found dead, police quickly arrested the most likely suspect. But cutting-edge technology from NASA enabled a forensic odontologist to prove the wrong man was behind bars.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a car was found in a drainage ditch with two bodies inside, a fingertip torn from a latex glove would point investigators to both the crime scene and the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: This killer probably hoped to cover his tracks by staging the crime scene. But investigators saw through the attempt almost immediately and turned to forensic science to learn what really happened that night.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, when the wife of a serviceman was brutally murdered in the Philippines, investigators had to reassemble a tiny computer disk that had been cut to pieces in order to find the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: They thought the fire would cover their crime. But one tiny clue, no bigger than a thumbtack, remained. It held all the information investigators needed to put a trio of cold-blooded killers behind bars.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2007, Brian and Beverly Mauck were found dead in their Graham, Washington home. Using a bloody palm print and shoe prints at the scene, investigators focus their attention on Daniel Tavares, who had previously inked a tattoo on Brian's back.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2003, St. Cloud teenager Jason MacLennan returned home after a night out with friends and discovered his father's body lying in a pool of blood.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a woman and her daughter didn't return home from shopping, her husband directed police to a nearby mall. The child's body was found, but there was no sign of the wife.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 34-year-old nurse experiences a variety of flu-like symptoms. None of her doctors are able to discover the cause, until she visits her gynecologist for a routine check-up.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, San Francisco pornographer Artie Mitchell was murdered in his home. His brother and business partner, who was found near the scene carrying a rifle, later confesses to shooting Artie.The question is whether the shooting was premeditated.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mother of two vanishes after a shopping trip. Her body is discovered a month later, and witnesses say they saw the victim being forced into a car by an unknown person.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In little more than a month, two women who lived in the same apartment complex were brutally murdered. The similarities of the crime scenes led police to conclude they were dealing with a serial killer who harbored an intense hatred of women.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: For six years, a serial killer prowled the streets of New York City. He wrote letters to police and The New York Post, indicating he would kill twelve people — one for each astrological sign.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Prompted by news of a flight attendant's brutal murder, the son of a previous victim contacts police. Both murders have similar MOs, and biological evidence proves that these were serial killings.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Robert Sims returns home after working the night shift and finds his wife unconscious on the kitchen floor. Their son is fast asleep in an upstairs bedroom, but their six-week-old daughter, Heather, is missing.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: Master Org's destruction of nature continues unchecked while the Power Rangers fight a last desperate battle for the Earth. Good and evil collide in a final battle between the forces of Animaria and the Orgs.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: When all the Ninja Academies in the world are destroyed by Lothor, only three young students, Shane, Tori and Dustin are not captured.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: When Shane decides to take on the Mad Magnet monster by himself, he learns that it takes teamwork and trust to overcome obstacles and maintain friendships.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: The others question Dustin's commitment to the Rangers when it seems he is spending too much time with his new motocross buddies, Blake and Hunter.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: The Thunder Rangers use the Tsunami Cycles and their Thunder Megazord to try and defeat the Wind Rangers.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: The Amphibidor monster tries to drain the city dry. Hunter and Blake reveal that they are the Thunder Rangers.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: When Hunter and Blake meet the ghosts of their parents in the Cavern of Lost Ninjas they learn that Lothor is responsible for their parents' deaths, not Sensei.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: The Power Rangers defend the city against Florabundacus, an evil monster who tries to destroy the world with carnivorous plants.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: When Lothor tries to use the Snipster to break up an international peace conference, the Power Rangers must use their inner ninja skill, and a new weapon, to cut the Snipster down to size.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: Hunter and Blake are fooled by Choobo, who erases their memories and pits them against the Wind Rangers.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: Blake and the Wind Rangers must find a way to break Choobo's spell over Hunter.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: Marah and Kapri send their alien boxing instructor, the Boxing Bopp-a-roo, to disrupt the Total Trek race that Shane and Hunter are running, to prove who is more "macho".

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: The Power Rangers fight against Trayf, the Pig Monster, who traps them in his nightmare world.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: Cam and his father quarrel because the Sensei is overprotective. Madtropolis drains the Rangers of their powers forcing Cam to go back to the past for a mysterious power source.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: Cam travels back in time to the Wind Ninja Academy to gain the powers he needs to become the Green Ranger and to save the younger versions of his parents from the menace of his evil uncle, Lothor.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: Lothor seeks revenge on Cam by sending five monsters at once to destroy the city.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: Cam's weird behavior comes at a bad time when Fragra captures two of the Rangers in perfume bottles.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: In an attempt to win over the hearts and minds of the Earth, Lothor and Mr. Ratwell produce a sitcom and administer a love potion.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: Hunter mentors a kid who happens to acquire Lothor's Personal Alien Manager; the teens are excited about an action sports video contest.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: Marah convinces Dustin that she wants to become a good person when she is replaced in the Lair by her friend Beevil.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: In an attempt to make his father human again, Cam builds a machine that accidentally turns Sensei into Shane - leaving Shane a guinea pig.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm
programme.desc: Dustin lets a bit of fame go to his head. Meanwhile, the Slob Goblin monster attacks the city, turning people into stamps.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Ninja Storm

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El tiránico Chef Gordon Ramsay regresa por tercer verano para enseñar y torturar a posibles Chefs. El ganador recibirá un trabajo de Chef en el resort Green Valley Ranch de Nevada.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los dos equipos se enfrentan en un desafío de preparación de alimentos que recompensa a los ganadores por la oportunidad de pasar tiempo con el Chef Ramsay fuera de la cocina.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay ordena a los concursantes restantes que preparen el desayuno para los miembros del servicio visitantes. El equipo ganador tendrá tiempo libre y los perdedores tendrán el rol de patrullar la cocina.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En el cuarto día, los Chefs restantes compiten en una prueba de degustación con los ojos vendados. Los perdedores deben aceptar un castigo difícil mientras los ganadores cenan con el Chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Para avanzar en este desafío, los siete Chefs restantes deben comprar y preparar la comida para la recepción de una boda.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Melissa se une a los hombres en una competencia para ver qué equipo puede preparar los mejores platos de langosta. Pero hay un problema: los equipos deben matar primero a sus crustáceos.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los seis concursantes restantes deben preparar aperitivos y platos principales con las sobras, por lo que ambos equipos deben crear sus propios menús de cena.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay consolida a los cinco concursantes restantes en un equipo, pero primero deben competir entre sí para impresionar a 100 estudiantes de secundaria.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los tres Chefs restantes preparan versiones gourmet de platos estadounidenses clásicos para jueces externos: sus madres, que no saben qué platos están probando.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los dos últimos competidores se enfrentan a un desafío final que implica algo más que cocinar: deben diseñar y administrar sus propios restaurantes.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En el final de temporada, los ánimos se enfurecen cuando los dos concursantes preparan un último servicio de cena para el chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Gordon Ramsay regresa para una cuarta temporada de torturas culinarias. Quince Chefs competirán por la oportunidad de trabajar en el propio restaurante de Ramsay en Los Ángeles.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El primer desafío de la temporada encuentra a los concursantes cortando a un rodaballo en finos filetes de 180 gramos. Un miembro de cada equipo debe actuar como camarero durante el servicio de comidas.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Después de que las gallinas los despiertan en sus habitaciones, los concursantes deben cocinar para la cena familiar lo que al principio les cantó.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Ace is to be executed in a matter of hours, and Magellan's toxic breath is singeing the back of Luffy's neck. Ivan uses a devastating Death Wink to buy some time, but the warden's Poison Hydra may be more than he can handle!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy dons a suit of waxy armor in preparation for his rematch with Warden Magellan. Outside the prison walls, Jimbei turns a door into a boat, so Crocodile and Buggy can commandeer an escape vessel!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Magellan takes his toxic attack to the next level by unleashing the hideous and deadly Venom Demon! If Jimbei and Crocodile don't return with a rescue ship soon, Luffy won't survive long enough to save Ace!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his merry band of escapees are safely onboard the rescue ship, but they're not out of hot water just yet. A fleet of marines is bombarding them with cannon balls, and an impenetrable gate looms on the horizon!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and Ivan mourn the loss of Bon Clay, and Captain Buggy's reputation gets a boost when a phone call from the Marines reveals the secrets of his past.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While Luffy continues his rescue mission, Nami learns a lesson about how to turn rain into cash, and Franky wakes up in a freezing forest full of ferocious cyborg animals!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji tries to fight his way off a most peculiar island, but his frilly battle costume threatens to awaken his inner maiden. Elsewhere, Chopper tries to avoid being served in a hot pot!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nico Robin lends her many hands to an overmatched gang of revolutionaries in a frigid land of eternal suffering, and Usopp bulks up to avoid becoming a snack for a hungry, hungry island!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro's attempt to reunite with his friends leads him to a massive tomb and a host of shadowy swordsmen. Elsewhere, Brook uses his status as Satan to get an eyeful of undergarments!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While the marines prepare for Ace's execution, Luffy looks back on all the good times he shared with his brother, and Jimbei reveals the shocking details of the day Fire Fist Ace went down in defeat!

programme.desc: Citizens and soldiers alike prepare for all-out war as Ace is led to the site of his execution. While the world watches, the true identity of the condemned man's father is shockingly revealed!

programme.title: One Piece

programme.desc: As a massive seaquake rocks Marineford, Ace recalls the ups and downs of his life as a pirate, including his first encounter with Whitebeard – and the unthinkable betrayal that led to his capture!

programme.desc: Whitebeard begins his attack with a tsunami-spawning sea quake, but the marines counter with a blast of frigid air that turns the tidal wave into an iceberg! Will Luffy and his crew arrive in time to join the battle?

programme.desc: In the wake of Little Oars Junior's tragic defeat, Admiral Sengoku hatches a devious plan to speed up the countdown to Ace's execution. The situation looks beyond bleak until a hero enters the fray from on high!

programme.desc: A murder confession obtained through use of truth serum puts Perry Mason on the side of a provocative patient.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: This episode gets off to a fetching start when a stunning sunbather, wearing only a bath towel, reveals to Perry Mason that all her worldly possessions were pilfered.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: While investigating a hit and run accident on behalf of a youthful client, Perry Mason happens upon another client, this one charged with murder.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Avowed loyalty of an attractive girl to a woman friend accused of theft and manslaughter impels Perry Mason to pit his legal skills against a preponderance of circumstantial evidence.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: A rich, revenge-seeking young woman engages Perry Mason to defend her when a new facet of an old con game erupts into murder.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.desc: Attempts to convince an unscrupulous private detective there is no payoff in blackmail leads to involving Perry Mason in a murder charge.

programme.title: Perry Mason

programme.title: Perry Mason

programme.title: Perry Mason

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Pawn Stars
