programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The three couples that were married at first sight learn about the importance of trust in their relationships. Will their marriages flourish?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars' "Old Man" Mr. Harrison stops by Count's Kustoms with a job that is as unique and old-fashioned as he is. Later, the guys aren't in love with Roli's new special custom project.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars have an opportunity to buy something they've never bought before--a helicopter! Can Rick convince the Old Man to come along and spin up a deal?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Adam and Caveman Rob head to South Africa to face the giant Bark Scorpion, the tiny Uroplectes Scorpion, and the highly venomous Lion Fish. Big pain comes in small packages, and the effects of marine animals' toxins are truly the next level of pain.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Mike and Frank are picking their way through Florida when they get a lead on a potential gold mine -- a five-acre property that's an automotive graveyard.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: The guys head to the Lone Star State, hoping to uncover a Texas-size honey hole. Once there, Mike and Frank dig through a huge outbuilding filled with dead coin-operated games.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Thousands of miles from home, the guys are scouring the back roads of Texas desperate to find the big-ticket item that will make the long trip worthwhile. Just like his late father, Aardean is a funeral director who never throws anything away.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Looking for picks in Texas, the guys see a sign for Gilley's Club, the honky-tonk club made famous in the 1980 film Urban Cowboy. Soon they're face to face with country music superstar Mickey Gilley himself.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: When Corey has a chance to buy an extremely rare Belgium-made 1942 Sarolea motorcycle, Rick has a big concern...making money.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Rick has a chance to buy a little piece of militaria he's never had before--a Flame Thrower. Can he turn up the heat and coax a deal or will this deal go up in flames?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars are presented with a mysterious pocket-sized sundial believed to be from the 16th Century...complete with a concealed secret inside.

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars have a chance to buy one of the quietest air crafts ever made--a vintage Schweizer glider.

programme.title: Pawn Stars

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars have a chance to shoot and score with a 2006 NBA Championship Ring.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: The Pawn Stars are presented with one of most unique items to ever hobble its way into the shop--a pirate's peg leg.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: The guys head to Michigan hoping to strike automotive gold in the heart of America's car capital. Clearing the contents of derelict storage lockers, Brian's sprawling auction house is a picker's playground.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Driving through Michigan in a freak spring snowstorm, the prospects look bleak until the guys spot an interesting old Cadillac for sale. With their picking senses twitching, they stop to see what else is on the property.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: Determined to uncover a hidden honey hole, the guys are freestyling on their home turf in Iowa.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Walking Tall (2004)
programme.desc: Chris Vaughn, a retired soldier who returns to his hometown only to discover the place he grew up is now overrun with crime, drugs and violence. Enlisting the help of his old pal, Chris gets elected Sheriff and fights to clean up his hometown.

programme.title: The Defender
programme.desc: Lance and his team are bodyguards for NSA's head sent by the president to a secret meeting outside Bucharest which is attacked. But Why?

programme.title: Close Range

programme.title: Honest Thief

programme.title: Waterlife

programme.title: Mexico: One Plate at a Time with Rick Bayless

programme.desc: Taken in by a psychologist's pronouncement that the only happily married couples are those who fight members of the Addams household devise schemes to start a battle between Gomez (John Astin) and Morticia (Carolyn Jones).

programme.desc: Gomez decides to bolster Cousin Itt's failing ego by making him the star of a production aimed as a birthday surprise for Wednesday. He hires the great director, Eric von Bissell, who gives Itt elocution lessons, causing a Hollywood star complex.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While Morticia and Gomez are celebrating their 13th wedding anniversary, she tells Wednesday and Pugsley a bedtime story of how she and Gomez first met. In this episode, Carolyn Jones plays Morticia, Morticia as a 22-year-old, and sister Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley refuse to go to bed until they hear the rest of the courtship story. Morticia resumes the tale via flashback, including the ceremony beginning with Ophelia Frump, Morticia's balmy sister, as the bride.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Romance seems close for Thing, the Addams right-hand-in-a-box, when Gomez's aunt arrives for a visit accompanied by Lady Fingers, her handmaiden. Thing enjoys the visit most because it gives him a chance to hold hands with one of his own kind.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez visit Mayor Henson to complain that their property tax is ridiculously low. After the Mayor proves his incompetence by offering a refund, Gomez is persuaded to become a candidate for the office.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: During a welcome home party for Cousin Itt, Morticia notices that the diminutive guest of honor seems to be losing his hair. Uncle Fester experiments with his chemistry set to produce a concoction that grows hair and tries the remedy on Itt.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley return in tears from trick-or-treating because a neighbor has told them there is no such thing as a witch. Morticia and Gomez plan to prove to the children that they do exist--by summoning a witch to a séance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Determined to correct the dreadful literature that Wednesday and Pugsley are exposed to, Morticia sets out to create a new literary world. Gomez fears that his wife's first manuscript is so good, that once the publisher reads it he will lose her.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: In need of artistic fulfillment, Morticia takes up sculpting. An art critic views her first endeavor--a three-eyed Gomez statue--and clubs it with his cane. Gomez, who won't have Morticia's heart broken gets a seedy art dealer to buy it.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley copies one of his dad's old love letters and sends it to his teacher. Miss Dunbar comes to visit the Addams home and confesses to Gomez that no man has ever fallen so in love with her, leading Morticia to pretend to be the jealous wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Wednesday befriends a new boy her age, Robespierre Courtney, Morticia invites his parents, Mr. and Mrs. Henry Courtney to visit the Addams house for tea. Unbeknownst to them, the Courtney's are hoping to meet a number of the social set.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: There is a neighborhood burglar on the loose, and Morticia has reason to believe it could be Gomez. Morticia decides to probe his subconscious mind for a key to his criminality after she and Uncle Fester discover loot hidden in the storeroom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's pet plant Cleopatra gobbles up her favorite photo of Gomez from the family album. When the original photographer is found and asked to make a duplicate picture, it is discovered that he is now with the Department of Motor Vehicles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez plays host to Don Xavier Molines, a family friend during his childhood in Spain, and his daughter Consuella. Morticia's hospitality is put to the test when Consuella reveals that she has been promised in marriage to Gomez since childhood.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Wednesday's and Pugsley's faith in Santa Claus is shaken, Uncle Fester is chosen to back up Santa in case the real St. Nick is too busy to come. However, Fester-Santa gets stuck in the chimney, so each of the other adults fills in for him.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Fester is so smitten upon receipt of a photo of his love, a bearded carnival lady, that he borrows stamp money to mail her a proposal. Morticia dons a beard and poses as the mother to convince Fester that he will have to work to support a wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Because she thinks Fester (Jackie Coogan) and Grandmama (Blossom Rock) are spoiling the children, Morticia (Carolyn Jones) hires a governess. Insulted, Fester paints a white line down the center of the Addams house, dividing it in half.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez see Fester conferring with TV muscleman Jack LaGrann (Jack LaLanne), and think that Fester is planning a television career. However, Uncle Fester confides to Lurch that he has to go on a secret diet and exercise.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez find Grandfather Pegleg's treasure map and summon Captain Grimby. They hope to charter his boat for the treasure hunt. But after meeting the Captain, Morticia is careful to keep the nature of the mission secret.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia Frump is madly in love with Horatio Bartholomew, the man who has everything, except the truth about her relatives. Morticia, not convinced by Bartholomew, persuades playboy Cousin Itt to stir the embers of his past romance with Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley shocks his parents when he gives up his new atomic reactor as kid stuff and announces that he wants to find his own job. His first try is as a medical assistant to Dr. Bird. He turns up, scalpel in hand, ready to help during an operation.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandma Frump (guest star Margaret Hamilton), comes to the mistaken conclusion that her daughter, Morticia (Carolyn Jones), and Gomez (John Astin) plan to pack her off to an old folks home. Actually, they plan to send her to a beauty farm.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia, in order to be part of the National Beautification Program, decides to become a home decorator and offers her services to the neighbors. Next door neighbor, and insurance agent, Joe Digby hires Morticia in hopes of selling them insurance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia taunts Uncle Fester into announcing that he is going to join the Peace Corps. Fester feels he's a cinch to be accepted because Gomez plans to pull strings in Washington on his behalf. The entire family agrees to help him study for the exam.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Allyn Joslyn guest-stars as Sam Hilliard, a former truant officer who now heads a private school where Wednesday and Pugsley are enrolled. When Hilliard breaks under the strain of dealing with the Addams children, Gomez buys the school.

programme.desc: A vegetarian racer struggles with a difficult decision when faced with a Norwegian delicacy, and Teams face their fears of heights during a gut-wrenching Roadblock.

programme.title: The Amazing Race

programme.desc: Teams are clowning around when they learn a traditional Russian circus act, but it's no joke when multiple teams make a critical error and misread a clue, jeopardizing their positions in the Race.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack gets a special behind-the-scenes look at a retirement home for chimpanzees where caregivers have rescued over 250 chimps that now live in large family groups on specially designed islands in Florida.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he meets some superb simians, each with their own unique adaptations. Proboscis Monkeys, Spider Monkeys, Macaques, Mandrills, Langurs, and lots more magnificent monkeys!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack as he takes his adventures to a whole new level with this journey through one of Africa's most pristine wild places. He finds baby elephants, rhinos, cheetahs, lions, hippos, and a whole lot more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack heads into South Africa's Zululand for an adventure with Cheetah, Rhino, Dung Beetles, and the Nyala antelope. Then he is welcomed into a Zulu tribe, with his daughter Kathaleen.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack takes his grandson on an epic Serengeti safari. They witness Cheetahs and Lions on the savannah, Wildebeest, and Zebra starting their annual migration, and visit a local Maasai school.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for six of his all-time scariest safaris. Come along as he comes face-to-face with Alligators, Lions, Elephants, Cheetah, Tigers and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: ack and Kathleen visit Joaquin's massive farm outside Guayaquil where he provides a haven for 45 species of animals native to Ecuador, including endangered spectacled bears, tapirs, and great green macaws.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack as he journeys to Lake Nakuru National Park where wildlife is prospering in Central Kenya. The thriving ecosystem is home to more than a million flamingos, endangered white and black rhinos, and the rare Rothschild giraffe.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Life in the Slow Lane
programme.desc: Today’s countdown is all about animals that know how to take it easy, from mellow mammals like manatees and koalas to relaxed reptiles like the giant Galapagos tortoise. Kick back, relax and take a ride in the slow lane!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is exploring the state of Florida from the bottom up! From Sea Turtles in the Florida Keys, to Gators in the Swamp, Manatees in Crystal River to Cheetahs and Rhinos living large at White Oak. Come along for some fun in the Florida sun!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: Jack and his daughter Kathleen share a boating adventure exploring the animal-rich rainforest surrounding the Panama Canal, including Howler and Capuchin monkeys and the deadly Fer de Lance snake.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack travels to Canada to check out four World Heritage sites in beautiful Alberta.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Animal Hospitals
programme.desc: Jack visits the doctors and hospitals that care for creatures big and small – from Silverback Gorillas and lightning-quick cheetahs to pet pigs and rescued possums. Today, see some of the world’s outstanding animal hospitals in action!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: A Horse Unless of Course
programme.desc: If you thought horses were cool, just wait until you meet some of their surprising relatives! Rhinos, tapirs, donkeys, zebras and the Horse Whisperer himself!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: On the Brink
programme.desc: For the animals on today’s countdown, like black rhinos, mountain gorillas and wild dogs, life is all about survival. Come along as Jack goes to ends of Earth to share seven spectacular stories of species on the brink.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: The people of Maui love the endangered humpback. Join Jack, a group of seaworthy school children and the Pacific Whale Foundation for a first-rate expedition to observe these 40-ton gentle giants.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Wickedly Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along if you dare as Jungle Jack is counting down hair-raising true stories from the sea, land and air! Face-to-face encounters with bats, caiman, snakes, plus real dragons, on this Wickedly Wild Countdown.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Need for Speed
programme.desc: Today’s countdown is taking a ride in the fast lane with some of nature’s speediest creatures…horses, kangaroos, cheetah, falcons and more. Don’t blink! You might miss one of today’s super-sonic species.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack is taking his show on the road through sunny California!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: From the bustling city of Cape Town to the wild eco-systems in the African bush, Jack and his family discover how wildlife is faring in this beautiful country and meet the conservationists dedicated to protecting it all.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Travel with Jack, and his wife Sue, to beautiful Cape Town as they discover how South Africa's wildlife is faring in the big city! Then they hit the beach to hang out with a breeding colony of African Penguins.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: CI: Coroner Investigator will reveal the most in-depth look to date into the science of death.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic Sculpting: Forensic sculptors retrieve people from oblivion. Using clay and an intricate knowledge of anatomy, forensic arts place a face on an unidentified skull, recreating the victim's likeness, which often leads to his name.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A dog can be a dead man's best friend. Dogs have been trained to sniff out corpses, drugs, explosives, and missing persons. They're often the first to find the essential clue that sets an investigation in motion.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A woman's body is found and investigators have little time and few clues to lead them to a killer who could strike again. Perpetrators try to conceal their crimes, yet savvy investigators can take the most obscure data and recreate a murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Fingerprinting: The identification Division of the FBI relies on fingerprints as one of the most effective ways to identify criminals.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Every family has its secrets, and sometimes blood relations lead to bloodshed. When money is the motive, murder can rip at the very foundation of marriage and family.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For serial killers, once is never enough. For investigators, the challenge is steep when the killers murder by numbers.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some people murder for love. But these killers did it for the money. When greed is the motive, investigators must make every clue pay off.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Hairs and Fibers: The tiniest filament can become a mark of distinction in the most singular and intimate of ways. Investigators have come to rely on forensic evidence as fine as a carpet fiber or as innocent as an eyelash to crack difficult cases.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic psychologists delve into the minds of serial killers, explaining why, most often, they can be a friendly neighbor or the tenacious co-worker – the one who hides his or her dark side better than anyone else.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Weeks pass as forensic investigators search for even the smallest clues, only to find what they feared in their own backyard. In Canada, two people die suddenly of unknown causes, and their deaths may not be as coincidental as they first appear.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: At a crime scene, anything left behind or seemingly out of place is considered a clue. But a fire can extinguish everything in its path –challenging forensic investigators at every turn and making each arson a trial by fire.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Using science as their most powerful weapon, investigators must find these hired killers and make them pay the true price of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Lies and deceit can often throw investigators off the trail of justice. But when hard evidence contradicts a killer's story, police must use the clues to piece together the truth.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tras el ataque al campamento, Rick conduce al grupo hacia el CDC, un recinto de la base sanitaria militar, en el que esperan encontrar un refugio seguro. Durante el trayecto, Jim debe tomar una decisión extremadamente difícil.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Un científico inquietante deja entrar a Rick y su grupo en el CDC. No obstante, hay algo extraño y los supervivientes del apocalipsis zombi empiezan a sospechar que no todo es lo que parece en el recinto.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo, liderado por Rick, se topa con una horda de zombis en mitad de la autopista. La pequeña Sophia, asustada, huye sola al bosque y todos tratarán de encontrarla antes de que sea demasiado tarde.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick encuentra una granja en la que buscar ayuda para salvar la vida de su hijo, quien recibió el impacto accidental de una bala. Después, Shane entra en una escuela llena de zombis para llevarse material sanitario junto al tipo que disparó a Carl.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Shane y Otis están atrapados por los zombis en la escuela adonde acudieron por el material sanitario necesario para operar a Carl. En la granja, surgen las primeras tensiones y Daryl y Andrea vuelven a salir en busca de Sophie.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Shane regresa a la granja con las medicinas, pero el sacrificio que he tenido que cometer no es bien visto por el resto del grupo. En la granja, el grupo intenta sacar a un zombi del pozo de agua fresca antes de que la infecte.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Mientras busca a Sophia, Daryl sufre un accidente que lo deja perdido y herido en el bosque. La tensión entre el grupo y los propietarios de la granja aumenta, así como la inestabilidad del propio grupo, debido a que Shane desafía a Rick.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Tras descubrir que la familia mantiene encerrada a sus familiares convertidos en zombis en el granero, Dale confronta a Hershel. Lori, por su parte, confiesa a Rick que está embarazada y los problemas entre los integrantes del grupo se intensifican.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Glenn le revela a todo el grupo el secreto del granero, pero no están de acuerdo sobre cómo actuar: Rick ordena respetar la autoridad de Hershel, aunque Shane quiere acabar con los zombis. Por otra parte, descubren por fin qué le ha pasado a Sophia.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Hershel no soporta lo ocurrido y recae en su alcoholismo, pero Rick y Glenn lo siguen hasta la ciudad para evitar que muera. Entretanto, Beth, incapaz de aceptar todo lo que le está sucediendo a su familia, entra en estado catatónico.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Lori sale en busca de Rick, pero lo único que encuentra es un peligro mortal y Shane va tras ella. Entretanto, Rick, Hershel y Glenn mantienen un tiroteo con los desconocidos con quienes cruzaron sus caminos en el bar.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: La tensión entre Rick y Shane aumenta y la decisión sobre el destino de Randall es el detonante: Shane quiere matarlo, Rick prefiere dejarlo vivo. Mientras, Beth pretende suicidarse y Andrea, quien debe vigilarla, no cumple con su cometido.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo descubre que Randall es un violador y asesino y acuerdan ejecutarlo, pero Dale se opone porque eso los convertiría también en criminales. Mientras tanto, Carl comete un error que acarreará consecuencias imprevistas.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Las diferencias entre Rick y Shane por el liderato del grupo y la gestión de la granja se intensifican cuando Shane decide por su cuenta el destino de Randall. La tensión termina estallando y los dos amigos se enfrentan a muerte.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Una horda de zombis invade la granja y el grupo intenta escapar vivo entre el caos, pero no todos lo lograrán. Además, Rick se harta de las quejas del grupo y les da un ultimátum: si quieren que sea el líder, acatarán sus órdenes.

programme.title: Sugar Ray Leonard vs Ayub Kalule

programme.title: Marvin Hagler vs John Mugabi

programme.title: Evander Holyfield vs George Foreman
programme.desc: On April 19th, 1991, Evander Holyfield fought George Foreman for the WBC, WBA, and IBF Heavyweight Titles in Atlantic City. Both fighters displayed incredible skill and resilience, but Holyfield ultimately emerged victorious after 12 rounds.

programme.title: Roy Jones Jr vs James Toney
programme.desc: On November 18th, 1994, Roy Jones Jr fought James Toney for the IBF Super Middleweight Title at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas. Jones displayed his exceptional athleticism and speed, outclassing Toney to win a unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali vs Mac Foster
programme.desc: On April 1st, 1972 Muhammad Ali and Mac Foster fought in a fifteen round bout that ended in a unanimous decision win for Ali.

programme.title: Marvin Hagler vs Thomas Hearns
programme.desc: On April 15th, 1985, Marvin Hagler fought Thomas Hearns for the undisputed Middleweight Title at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas. Hagler and Hearns absolutely went at it from the bell which ended with Hagler securing a thrilling knockout victory.

programme.title: James Toney vs Charles Williams
programme.desc: On July 29th, 1994 James Toney and Charles Williams battled eachother for IBF World Super Middleweight titles at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas resulting in a knockout victory for James Toney.

programme.title: Roberto Duran vs Sugar Ray Leonard 1

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: To track down the cheating tinhorn gambler Johnny Deuce and recover his money, Randall befriends the card sharp's protégé, a 12-year-old orphan boy and card cheat, nicknamed The Montana Kid.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh embarks on a mission of mercy when he pleads with the parents of a boy with appendicitis to let the doctor operate.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: The government employs Randall to portray an escaped prisoner in order to trick his cellmate into leading authorities to the $50,000 he stole and stashed away in a secret location.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Hollister is taken prisoner by a trio of fugitives who need him as a guide on their escape route to Mexico. Left with his guns but no bullets, the sheriff searches desperately for a means of escape and must make a last-ditch gamble for survival.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: An enraged Apache bravely kills the white man who murdered his father. Both Sheriff Hollister and the victim's brother pursue the Indian -- with very different goals -- and trap him in a box canyon that the Apache has rigged with dynamite.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Gunman Nate Crandall murders a rancher to steal $20,000. Sheriff Hollister gets to the loot first and locks it in a safe. Determined to get the money, Crandall involves young Jim Edwards in a plot to rob the safe and take the fall for the killing.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Reverend Tuttle is aboard the stagecoach when it is robbed by three masked gunmen. Sheriff Hollister suspects Big Jim Sten, boss of a nearby town, is behind the robbery. But when the reverend and Hollister visit Sten's town, a secret is revealed.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Jett Sergeant, son of a notorious outlaw, sees Hollister kill his father in a shootout and vows he will kill the Sheriff. Clay tries to set him straight, but the youth teams up with two of his father's henchmen in a plot a murder the Sheriff.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Frank Leslie returns to Tombstone to marry the widow of the man he killed and pledges never to use guns again. But four brothers of Leslie's victim come to Tombstone intent on revenge, putting his oath to the test.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Two ranchers have started a range war that is spilling into Wichita where innocent people could be killed.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp learns Masterson has dropped out of school and is a scout for the Army.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: The Taylors open a café in Wichita but word that he is a cousin of criminal Mannon Clements causes strife for them.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp takes the job of Dodge City Marshal. He arrives to find the Sheriff and his deputy under siege and the men on Front Street trying to kill him.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: The Big T outfit is angry with Earp's attempt to tame Dodge City so they decide to ambush him with the help of Jim Kelley.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: The dance hall run by Dora Hand is a constant site of trouble between the buffalo hunters and railroad workers so Earp is called on to help.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Pete Albright tries to hire gunfighter Clay Allison to kill Earp to open up Dodge City. Allison won't take money but is willing to kill Earp.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: The Judge's daughter has fallen for Earp but Earp realizes there is no future for them given his job.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: A newspaper man from New York comes to Dodge City to write about it expecting a wild and dangerous town but finds the town quiet.

programme.title: Bat Masterson
programme.desc: A shotgun-toting Texas lady meets Bat Masterson when he goes to Nora Grant's farm in Beaumont, Texas. This is most surprising as his arrival is in response to an urgent telegram that he hurry there.

programme.title: Bat Masterson
programme.desc: Bat turns banker in Denver and discovers that having gold isn't enough - you've got to be able to convince other people you've got it. When one of Bat's enemies starts a run on the bank, Bat brings home the bullion.

programme.title: Bat Masterson
programme.desc: The twain' finally meet in a Bat Masterson adventure involving a beautiful Chinese girl and a gigantic young man in an adventure involving a lottery and a mining claim.

programme.title: Bat Masterson
programme.desc: Bat Masterson stakes his life to establish Justice in the desert town of Eden, New Mexico. Arriving there more dead than alive, he finds a murder trial in progress.

programme.title: Bat Masterson
